existingVNetName.value: the vnet whose DNS is set up with your Azure AD Domain Service DNS

existingVNetResourceGroup.value: the resource group that your vnet belongs to

domainJoinUserName.value: the domain username that has privilege to join VMs to domain

domainJoinPassword.value: the password for the domain user

domainFQDN.value: your Azure AD Domain Service domain name, ex: contoso.local

PDC.value: host name of your Azure AD Domain Service Domain Controller 1

BDC.value: host name of your Azure AD Domain Service Domain Controller 2

PDCIP.value: IP of your Azure AD Domain Service Domain Controller 1

BDCIP.value: IP of your Azure AD Domain Service Domain Controller 2
